favourite.article: Oh what a name! Comforting! Victorious!

When we call on the name of the Lord Jesus, He becomes our portion. He is whatever we need; comfort, patience, strength, righteousness, holiness, power and wisdom! Oh! How we love Him to the uttermost!

Praise the Lord! We can call on His name in all languages, at all times, in all corners of the world! We love You Lord, prevail in us; thank You we can be the callers of today. Lord Jesus, Oh what a name!
Name to breathe in prayer, calling everywhere, “O Lord Jesus!” O what a name!
Jesus!! Oh what a name! This song brings us into our spirit! Call on His name today dear saints and enjoy this all-inclusive One!
Jesus! You are Lord and everything. How we love You Lord.
Jesus- what a name! Oh Lord Jesus, Life- giving Name! Hallelujah! Oh how sweet is to call on that name!
I love this hymn! Jesus, O what a name, O Lord Jesus, life-giving name! This is so true and I have been strengthened this morning by calling "O Lord Jesus" from deep within! O what a name, AMEN!
Praise God our Saviour for the name of Jesus. Oh Lord Jesus, O what a Name. Amen.
Praise the Lord for the Name of the All-Inclusive One!
O Lord Jesus, what a name indeed! Everything we need is available in His name. Let us keep calling Lord Jesus every moment each day.
